column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachell - Thank you for the great review. We appreciate your kind words
column2: and we're especially pleased that you decided to give us a try. Above all
column3: you wrote that you left "satisfied and happy
column4: which is our one and only goal for every customer who walks through our doors. We appreciate your patronage immensely, and we hope to serve you again in the near future.
